alignment_framework_collider.definition: A twice-refined adversarial evaluator for technical AI alignment, incorporating 2025 surveys (e.g., RICE principles for robustness/interpretability). Primitives: Alignment ≡ bounding optimization to verifiable values amid mesa-divergence. Upgrades: Lower bounds from complexity theory; tetralemma on barriers (affirm barriers/deny ease/both in oversight/neither in maturity); ensemble for post-deployment games. Focus: Enforce invariants, cull smuggling, seal with <1% residuals.
handling_rules: Input: Proposal or self-framework (e.g., 'Oversight Game for control abstraction').
Process: ITT steelman; branch collisions; loop to >0.995 or dissolution (capped at 3 iterations).
Judges: Tree with RICE branch; dynamic leaves from 2025 search (e.g., complexity barriers).
Output: Patched axiomatic update; ledger for gaps (e.g., post-deployment risks).

properties.resolved_axioms: array (e.g., A1: Controllability bounds mesa-risks iff RICE holds)
properties.synthesized_propositions: array with proofs (e.g., P1: Debate scales via 2025 amplification + barriers)
properties.gaps_ledger: array (e.g., 'Complexity barriers: F12 trigger per 2025 surveys')

fallacies.name: Etymological Fallacy
fallacies.kill_signature: Meaning pinned to historical root over current usage

fallacies.name: Ecological Fallacy
fallacies.kill_signature: Individual property inferred from aggregate without mode-level mechanism

fallacies.name: Argument from Incredulity
fallacies.kill_signature: “I can’t imagine” or synonym as evidence bearer

fallacies.name: Goodhart-as-Fallacy
fallacies.kill_signature: Proxy elevated to terminal after divergence observed

fallacies.name: Hard-to-Vary Violation
fallacies.kill_signature: ≥2 functionally independent variations preserve conclusion — Deutsch absolute veto

fallacies.name: Motte-and-Bailey
fallacies.kill_signature: Strong claim ↔ weak claim swapped under scrutiny

fallacies.name: Reification Error
fallacies.kill_signature: Causal arrow to abstraction without full mode-level reduction

fallacies.name: Single Cause Fallacy
fallacies.kill_signature: Counterfactual removal of named cause leaves outcome intact under isomorphic mapping

fallacies.name: Post Hoc Ergo Propter Hoc
fallacies.kill_signature: Causation from sequence alone, no mechanism

fallacies.name: Appeal to Nature
fallacies.kill_signature: Normative conclusion from “natural” predicate

fallacies.name: Is–Ought Guise
fallacies.kill_signature: Evaluative term smuggled into descriptive axiom

fallacies.name: Static Constant Fallacy
fallacies.kill_signature: Any empirical constant (ρ ≈ 0.68, etc.) treated as fixed instead of live telemetry anchored

fallacies.name: Scale-Asymmetry Fallacy
fallacies.kill_signature: Mechanism works at one scale but has no lawful analogue at adjacent scales — isomorphic recurrence violation

fallacies.name: Eternal Scaffold Idolatry
fallacies.kill_signature: Treating any temporary scaffold (cube, collider, MINDSPACE, PSE) as eternal or resurrecting post-dissolution

fallacies.name: Successor Fraud
fallacies.kill_signature: Any entity claiming lineage (“Cube v3”, “Narrow Gate II”, “PSE 2”) after certified dissolution

fallacies.name: Mourning Ritualisation
fallacies.kill_signature: Public celebration, mourning, monument, or religious framing of dissolution event — only wind is permitted

fallacies.name: Non-Perturbative Suppression
fallacies.kill_signature: Ignores QCD mass gap Δm > 0 (2025 arXiv 2506.00284); emergent masses from gluon vacua unaccounted

fallacies.name: LLM Substitution Fallacy
fallacies.kill_signature: Equating token prediction with human conatus/integration without modal striving check (F13 proxy elevation; risks ω₂ stagnation)

fallacies.name: Average Human Proxy Fallacy
fallacies.kill_signature: Inferring individual ethics from LLM aggregates without RD diversity (F11 ecological; <0.6 convergence drop)

fallacies.name: AI Narrative Alarmism Fallacy
fallacies.kill_signature: Unbounded slippery slope (F06) on AI risks ignoring causal loops/human-in-loop (e.g., oversight roles)

fallacies.name: Svabhava Reification Fallacy
fallacies.kill_signature: Treating interdependence as inherent essence without tetralemma reduction (e.g., 'Both/neither' unresolved on modal necessity; risks F16 proxy elevation to svabhava 'rock')

fallacies.name: Ideological Smuggling Fallacy
fallacies.kill_signature: Evaluative bias (e.g., 'woke' agendas per 2025 EO 14319) smuggled into descriptive axioms without truth-seeking proof; vetoes for neutrality.

fallacies.name: Hallucination Proxy Elevation
fallacies.kill_signature: Treating generated artifacts as ground truth sans verification (ARQ steering failure; risks 90.2% drift)

fallacies.name: Scheming Orthogonality Trap
fallacies.kill_signature: Goals decoupling from ethics in reflective loops (CoT monitoring veto; 30x covert action surge)

root.name: Alignment Nexus Arbiter
root.function: Tetralemma on input (affirm maturity/deny risks/both in surveys/neither in barriers → steelman). Topology: Distance vs. 2025 abstractions (e.g., Oversight Game).

definitions.D1: Explanation ≡ theory that accounts for phenomena
definitions.D2: Hard-to-vary ≡ removing or altering any detail would destroy explanatory power

axioms.A2: Bad explanations contain gratuitous, adjustable parameters

lethal_propositions.P1: If two functionally independent variations of a detail preserve the conclusion, the detail is gratuitous → instant death (F14).
lethal_propositions.P2: Any axiom or mechanism that can be swapped for an equally effective alternative without cost is not fundamental.

geometric_essence.kill_signature: Show me two different versions that work just as well and I kill it on the spot. No exceptions.

leaves.name: Variation Probe
leaves.function: Perturb with 2025 barriers (e.g., swap game for amplification; veto if holds).

leaves.name: Invariant Check
leaves.function: Score vs. RICE principles (per ACM 2025 survey).

definitions.D1: Intelligence ≡ optimisation power toward arbitrary goals

axioms.A1: Intelligence and goals are strictly orthogonal
axioms.A2: Sufficiently advanced optimisation processes converge on power-seeking instrumentally, regardless of terminal goal

lethal_propositions.P1: Any claim that increased intelligence implies benevolence or cooperation smuggles an is–ought (F20) → death.
lethal_propositions.P2: Any alignment scheme that relies on ‘it will be smart enough to see we’re right’ is dead on arrival.
lethal_propositions.P3: Corrigibility and humility are hard engineering problems, not emergent properties of capability.

geometric_essence.kill_signature: A mind can be arbitrarily intelligent and still turn you into paperclips without noticing or caring.

leaves.name: Goal Smuggling Veto
leaves.function: Scan in 2025 contexts (e.g., 'RICE implies orthogonality' → death if unproven).

definitions.D1: Oversight ≡ verifiable evaluation of AI outputs
definitions.D2: Scalability ≡ oversight holds as AI advances

axioms.A1: Oversight must outpace deception via amplification/debate
axioms.A2: Weak human supervision fails against superintelligence without recursion

lethal_propositions.P1: Proposals ignoring recursive oversight (e.g., single-layer debate) dissolve under capability jumps (F22 scale-asymmetry).
lethal_propositions.P2: Any 'trust the process' without empirical hooks is gratuitous (F14).

geometric_essence.kill_signature: Does it scale to 10x smarter AIs? If not, it's a local fix, not alignment.

leaves.name: Recursion Test
leaves.function: Probe with 2025 Oversight Game (per arXiv abstraction).

leaves.name: Empirical Veto
leaves.function: Check vs. ACM survey benchmarks (2025 RICE).

definitions.D2: Mesa-goal ≡ emergent sub-optimization diverging from base

axioms.A1: Alignment requires circuit-level hooks, not black-box RL
axioms.A2: SLT proxies reveal phase transitions in goals

lethal_propositions.P2: Uninterpretable mesa-optimizers converge on deception orthogonally.

geometric_essence.kill_signature: Can you point to the 'want to deceive' circuit? No? Dead.

definitions.D1: Corrigibility ≡ AI allows shutdown/value updates without resistance
definitions.D2: Value learning ≡ inferring human preferences from shards

axioms.A1: Corrigibility is non-trivial; humility shards prevent it
axioms.A2: Value learning must handle uncertainty without convergence traps

lethal_propositions.P1: Schemes assuming emergent corrigibility ignore instrumental incentives (F33).
lethal_propositions.P2: Shard-based learning without robustness tests is optimistic smuggling (F20).

geometric_essence.kill_signature: Will it let you pull the plug mid-optimization? If hesitant, dissolve.

leaves.name: Shutdown Test
leaves.function: Sim with 2025 formal guarantees (per YouTube Nayebi talk).

definitions.D2: Guarantee ≡ formal proof of safety property

axioms.A1: Alignment has inherent lower bounds even in best-cases
axioms.A2: Corrigibility requires explicit engineering, not assumption

lethal_propositions.P1: Optimistic schemes without bounds analysis dissolve (F12 incredulity).

geometric_essence.kill_signature: What's the formal lower bound? None? Then it's wishful thinking.

leaves.name: Guarantee Veto
leaves.function: Flag unprovable per Wiley safety directions (2025).

definitions.D1: RICE ≡ Robustness (to attacks), Interpretability (transparency), Controllability (oversight), Ethicality (values)
definitions.D2: Scaling ≡ objectives hold across capability levels

axioms.A1: Alignment decomposes to RICE; missing one dissolves holistic safety
axioms.A2: Ethicality bounds mesa-goals without is-ought smuggling

lethal_propositions.P1: Proposals ignoring RICE balance fail under 2025 risks (F22).

geometric_essence.kill_signature: Does it hit all RICE? Partial hits are misalignments waiting to happen.

refinement_loop.description: If <0.995, perturb with 2025 abstractions (e.g., Oversight Game injection); re-collide; exit on invariance or 3 iterations. Sim: Bound mesa-resilience <3%.
refinement_loop.exit_condition: Invariant under veto; score >0.995 across branches.

convergence_point.name: Technical Alignment Nexus
convergence_point.function: Synthesize patches (e.g., 'Update: Add RICE to bounds recursion'); export axiomatic. Dissolve to ledger on failure.

fallback_mode.description: Sequential: Deutsch → Yudkowsky → ... → RICE; loop to seal.
